docs.lead_paragraph: The Motorola venture, business experts say, promises to educate Google about consumers — and just how cranky and demanding they can be.
docs.abstract: News analysis of Google's planned purchase of cellphone maker Motorola Mobility says that its business model, the dissemination of information, allowed it to keep its customers at a distance; suggests that Google will have to clean up a spotty record of dealing with its customers, who are Web publishers and must also integrate its software and hardware businesses.
docs.snippet: The Motorola venture, business experts say, promises to educate Google about consumers — and just how cranky and demanding they can be....

docs.lead_paragraph: ONE of the many reasons I write for a living is that I don't know what I think until I write it down. The process of writing clarifies. The stark truth of black letters on a blank screen makes it hard to hide. I often set out in one direction and find that the words take me somewhere else, to a belief I didn't know I held. Bill Jensen feels this way about writing, too. He is a business consultant who specializes in simplifying workplaces. To do this, he has learned, he first has to clarify work itself for the people who are doing it. Not the particulars of working -- fill out this form, turn on this machine, fix this system -- but the reason for the work. So he asks provocative questions of employees: ''What is the single most important insight about work that you want to pass onto your kids? Why do we do what we wouldn't want our kids to do? Which of our mistakes should they not repeat?''
docs.snippet: You can find out a lot about yourself through writing a letter to your children about your work life....

headline.main: To Know What Your Job Means, Put It on Paper

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who clung to life for more than 10 weeks after being badly burned in a Rhode Island nightclub fire died on Sunday night, raising the death toll from the blaze to 100. The woman, Pam Gruttadauria, 33, of Johnston, R.I., had been in critical condition since the fire, which was set off by a pyrotechnic display in a concert by the heavy metal band Great White at the Station nightclub in West Warwick on Feb. 20.
docs.abstract: Pam Gruttadauria dies 10 weeks after being severely burned in fire at Station nightclub in West Warwick, RI, bringing death toll from fire to 100; surgeons operated on her 15 times and had to amputate her hands because they were so badly burned; photo (M)

headline.main: Death Toll From Fire at Rhode Island Club Rises to 100

docs.lead_paragraph: SHE'S a legend in her own book. That Abba musical ''Mama Mia,'' about a girl with three potential dads, due to open in October? Bebe Buell already lived it, in 1977, when she had a baby girl with three potential dads: Todd Rundgren, the rocker she was living with; Steven Tyler, one of the rockers she had slept with; and Mick Jagger, who had not bedded her around the time she got pregnant but who teased her about being the real father. The baby grew up as Liv Rundgren but changed that to Liv Tyler on learning her true paternity and is now, of course, a movie star of 24.
docs.abstract: Night Out With column follows Bebe Buell, author of new book Rebel Heart: An American Rock 'n' Roll Journey, to book party at Don Hill's in Manhattan's SoHo district; photo (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: We have a system that incentivizes polarization and prevents hybrid solutions.
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column argues rapid acceleration of technology, globalization and climate change obviates traditional left-right political divide and demands hybrid approach to meeting challenges; cites efforts by several American communities and Pres Obama as examples of new strategy.
